title: Oscar D. Garrett
text: I’m Oscar, a Plant Biology Ph.D. student at the University of California, Davis. I conduct my research in Pamela Ronald’s lab, where I use synthetic and computational biology to improve crops, with a particular emphasis on disease resistance.
